website_summaries.verdict: Outside mat with drainage holes that comes in a variety of sizes.
pros: Natural-looking grass packed with perforated latex
Weatherproof, as well as UV- and fire-resistant
cons: If left in direct sun, this mat will get very hot

customer_reviews.title: It is about time
customer_reviews.text: Finally – The outrageous cost of specialty, frivolous housing for a piece of fake grass is overridden. The patch of fake grass (with maybe a disposable puppy pad underneath) is all you need. Wondered when this would come on the market as simply what it is -- versus gussied up with subscriptions and structures. Now it has, and this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: 2cents

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Had a strong chemical smell when it arrived and it was really small. The dog didn't want anything to do with it and neither did I. Way too smelly so that means tons of chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: S. Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: My dog has astro turf in her original home where she was bred, so I thought she knows grass I will get her one. These are horrible! Even if you set it on top of the puppy pad it is impossible to tell if she has gone potty on it. And then all she wants is to dig on it or chew the corners. Do NOT buy this you will have grass bits all over your house!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my senior dog who was no longer able to use the doggie door or go down the steps into the yard. She took it to it almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzygrrl

customer_reviews.title: Great for house breaking puppy!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy immediately took to the mat outdoors without issue making house break training a breeze. I do use washable pooch pads underneath since it doesn't come with a tray and haven't had any issues with it staining or stinking up my apartment patio. Worth the price and convenience!
customer_reviews.author: P. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I got this so my dog would have something to lay on when we're enjoying time on the patio and for the rare occasion when he has a potty emergency. I was amazed at how soft it is! It feels great on bare feet and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Sure Hope It is Non-Toxic
customer_reviews.text: Just got it a few hours ago. He has not pottyed on it, but sure is lunching out chewing on it. It is holding up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Biblio Phil

customer_reviews.title: Dog won't use it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog would not potty on it, she sleeps on it.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: It's there and let's hope it works!!
customer_reviews.text: Just want the puppy to use it all the time. Lol!! It seems alittle thinner than our last one.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine H Zilligen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: I ha e used it for the base of a foot all helmet lamp. Easy to work with thick and lush
customer_reviews.author: dan shearin

customer_reviews.title: waste of $ since defeats its purpose
customer_reviews.text: The “grass” is falling off & makes a bigger mess=waste of $ since defeats its purpose
customer_reviews.author: LillyahC

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality for what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: michelle nixon

customer_reviews.title: Not for what they say it is!
customer_reviews.text: Not what expected, mu dog does not even get close to it’
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are either too big of to small.
customer_reviews.text: I was well pleased except the size is not quite big enough,but they would be the only negative thing about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Hidden object addict

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, wish it was better
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this. It seems to be very poor quality and shedded so much as soon as I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: kayley246

customer_reviews.title: Not puppy proof
customer_reviews.text: Did not stand up to my puppy. I have a chewer and within 8 weeks she destroyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jarod Podliska

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money! - I recieved a patch of dry-rotted fake grass that crumbles.
customer_reviews.author: rebeccas

product_meta.title: ECO MATRIX Artificial Grass Dog Training Door Mat Pee Pad Fake Grass Doormat Pet Turf Soft Green Lawn Rug Synthetic Grass Carpet
feature_bullets: ♥ NATURE LOOK: The Ecomatrix pet door mat grass turf that looks extra lush, feels great under bare feet, and with quality material. Size: 18 inch X 24 inch
♥ WASHABLE: The outdoor pet grass carpet with SBR Latex back has drain holes for good drainage and can be easy to clean
♥ DURABLE AND NON-SLIP: Through rain or sunshine, pet poop or pee, this premium artificial grass rug dog training mat holds up durably. Slip-resistant backing keeps your dog mat in place
♥ ENVIRONMENT FRIENDLY: It's eco-friendly without toxic chemicals. The fake grass doormat pad is perfectly safe for pets
♥ MULTIPURPOSE: The synthetic grass green lawn rug can not only be used as a cat/dog litter mat, also be a resting pad and doormat, soft and comfortable
